user_description: Baby I was born this way.
My love,you have my heart for all eternity and if I die in that arena,my last thought will be of your lips.
let us face it,let us be loyal to the ideal.
There is a crack in everything,that's how the light gets in.
Count your age by friends, not years. Count your life by smiles, not tears
akimoto kumiko de su.yo ro shi ku
I don't want to survise. I want to live!
